title: Kafun Shoujo Chuuihou! The Animation
synopsis: As the season changes to spring and flowers begin to bloom, there is one thing humanity looks toward in dread. Yes, the ever troublesome pollen allergy season has come to defile its victims once more, but it's not their noses that are being blown.
staff: [['Koume, Keito', ['Original Creator']], ['Hattori, Noritomo', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
